sentence.Network_en: Faber found his boastfulness irritating. " How many enemy aircraft did you shoot down? "
sentence.Network_cn: 费伯被他的吹嘘激怒了. “ 你打下几架敌机 呢 ? ”

sentence.Network_en: The fiddler's boastfulness also bothered Kunta.
sentence.Network_cn: 拉琴人的夸夸其谈也使昆塔厌烦.

sentence.Network_en: I am most unhappy at his boastfulness.
sentence.Network_cn: 我对他的大言不惭很不高兴.
